title: Simple Lightweight Modal
shortDescription: Simple Free Lightweight Modal with cool options
longDescription:
Simple lightweight modal Cloudflare app with French translation and more options:

RichText message
Add optionnal button
Add colors customization
Add redirection feature
Add style options
Add French translation
author: Hassan Akaou

AddFrenchTraduction.description: If activated, this options detects the html tag 'lang' attribute and load the French traductions

enumNames.false: No, I prefer the same message in all pages
enumNames.true: Add a French traduction

AddFrenchTraduction.title: Do you want to add a French traduction?

enumNames.false: Close the popup when visitors click on the button
enumNames.true: Redirect when visitors click on the button

ButtonBehaviorRedirect.title: Redirect when visitors click on the button

enumNames.false: Remove the confirmation button
enumNames.true: Display a confirmation button on the popup

PopupButton.title: Add a confirmation button to the popup

enumNames.false: Fire this popup only every time the page is loaded
enumNames.true: Fire this popup only once per visitor

ShowOnlyOnce.title: Show this popup only once per visitor?

UrlRedirectionEN.title: Specify an URL to drive traffic

UrlRedirectionFR.title: Specify an URL to drive traffic on french version

location.description: Where should the app appear on your site?
location.title: Location

radius.title: How rounded should the popup appear?
